text: gandee aurate ganden mardon ke lie (munaasib) hain aur gande mard gandee aurato ke lie aur paak auraten paak mardon ke lie (mauzoon) hain aur paak mard paak auraton ke lie log jo kuchh unakee nisbat baka karate hain usase ye log buree ul zimma hain un hee (paak logon) ke lie (aakhirat mein) bakhshis hai
